string.value: Another New Skill for Blaze Wizards
I better ask #b#p1101004##k about this new skill per comments from #p1101002#.

#p1101004#told me that if I wanted to learn a new skill, I'll have to prove my skills again by entering #bHall #4#k at #m130020000#, where a tougher test will take place... \n\n#i4032126# #t4032126# #b#c4032126# / 1#k
I managed to defeat the boss monster again and brought back #t4032126# in return. #p1101004# told me I have proven that I deserve to learn the new skill and taught me Meteo Shower.

What is it? A new skill? Is it #p1101002# again?! I really told him to keep his mouth shut, but noooo...! Fine, I know how you'll react to this, so yes there is a new skill, and yes, you will need to pass the test.
Go over to #bthe 4th Drill Hall#k of #m130020000#. Take the test there, and bring back #b#t4032126##k. It's not as simple and easy as it sounds, but if you can do it, I'll teach you the skill.
What... what? Really? You... don't seem as eager to acquire a new skill as you were before.
Wow! You did manage to bring back #t4032126#! I am so glad you did! I'm relieved now, and yes, you deserve the skill. Here it is.
I have just taught you a new skill for the Blaze Wizards, #bMeteor Shower#k! Use this to your advantage!
Ah, were you not able to find #b#t4032126##k...? You can get it at #bthe 4th Drill Hall#k of #m130020000#. Of course, you know that it's the getting part that's the hardest.
